MainCode.classTitle: optics making optical elements or apparatus c03, or other appropriate subclasses or classes; materials per se, see the relevant places
MainCode.maingroupTitle: optical objectives characterised both by the number of the components and their arrangements according to their sign, i.e. + or - takes precedence
MainCode.subclassTitle: optical elements, systems, or apparatus takes precedence; measuring-instruments, see the relevant subclass of g01

FurtherCodes_0.maingroupTitle: optical objectives specially designed for the purposes specified below with variable magnification in general
